description: The world famous Logan McCree has taken a break from videos and he’s living a quiet life in Europe. We’re in Berlin and our German producer happens to be friends with Logan. By pure chance and incredible luck, we have Logan for MOE and BG. As stated in the interview, Logan doesn’t take BDSM lightly. He practices it in real life and we are the first company that he trusts with this genre. Logan is in bondage for the first time on video. It was simply magical on the set with him. Enjoy!
title: The One and Only Logan McCree
